RelatedSentence: In 2013 , a grand total of 10,363,904 foreign tourists visited Japan .
That number surpasses the goal of the Visit Japan Campaign , which began in 2003 with a goal to increase the number of overseas visitors to 10 million .

TripAdvisor drew on statistics provided by the Japan Tourism Agency ( JTA ) , the Japan National Tourism Organization ( JNTO ) , the Ministry of Land , Infrastructure , Transport and Tourism , and numbers from their own website to design the visual graphic .
Relaxed visa policies have made it easier to come .
